title: Ally Financial Announces Date of 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders
content:
SOURCE Ally Financial

DETROIT 

Under SEC Rule 14a-8, a shareholder who intends to present a proposal at the 2016 annual meeting and who wishes the proposal to be included in the proxy statement for that meeting must submit the proposal in writing to the Corporate Secretary of Ally Financial at 200 Renaissance Center, Mail Code 482-B09-C24, Detroit, Michigan 

With respect to shareholder nominees for director election at the 2016 annual meeting and shareholder proposals for consideration at the 2016 annual meeting that are not submitted for inclusion in proxy materials under Rule 14a-8, written notice of nominations and proposals must be provided to the company in accordance with the company's bylaws. The notice must be delivered to Corporate Secretary between November 5, 2015 

About Ally Financial Inc.

Ally Financial Inc. (NYSE: ALLY) is a leading automotive financial services company powered by a top direct banking franchise. Ally's automotive services business offers a full spectrum of financial products and services, including new and used vehicle inventory and consumer financing, leasing, vehicle service contracts, commercial loans and vehicle remarketing services, as well as a variety of insurance offerings, including inventory insurance, insurance consultative services for dealers and other ancillary products.
